Description: POBEDA ZIM Soviet Mechanical USSR WristwatchExcellent acquisition for the personal collection or in the gift. description:Pobeda is the brand name of famous soviet wristwatches. Pobeda watches were especially designed by soviet watchmakers for the anniversary of the Great Patriotic War (WWII) in 1946. The brand, style and mechanism were supervised by Stalin himself. In the USSR Pobeda was famous all over the country. Pobeda was traditionally given as a government award for the best labors and veterans. This watches were also well-known in other socialist countries. Pobeda watches are no longer manufactured. Factory: ZIM - Plant named Maslyannikova.Measures: Gender: Male. Female.
